document_data.mainbody:
lderstars was a grand manor located in the Temple District of Ravens Bluff during the 14 century DR. It was a massive, 5-story manse, decorated with gabled roofs and gargoyle heads, located on the corner of Manycoins Way and Hawk Passage within the districts Holyhouses neighborhood. 
Around the year 1370, it was the home of Sir Uldren Stonefist Deepaxe, chair of the citys Knights Council.
